items.name: Part 1. Build Nouns Bowling as a Lead Title
items.description: Nouns Bowling is a new 3D bowling game built with CC0 assets from the 3D Nouns and Noun Sounds projects. This game is LIVE on the iOS App Store today!

items.name: Part 2. Establish the Nouns CC0 Gaming Toolkit
items.description: As we build Nouns Bowling, we'll create the Nouns CCO Gaming Toolkit...

items.name: Part 3. Fire Up a Game Publishing Pipeline
items.description: Process for prototyping and shipping Nouns games...

items.name: Part 4. Launch a Nouns gaming website
items.description: First place to launch prototypes (early access for NFT holders)...

items.name: Part 5. Publish and Evolve Nouns Games

description: Increasing the Value of Nouns with Games, by: Designing a set of Games for Nouns Communities... Hot take: Nouns games should AVOID play-to-earn cryptocurrency models. Gone wrong, they can do more damage to the Nouns brand than good. We don't plan on issuing a token or using play-to-earn tokenomics.
title: Nouns Game Publisher: Changing the Game
